Job Title: Territory Sales Manager

Location: Mayville, WI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Metalcraft of Mayville
Metalcraft of Mayville is an Equal Opportunity Employer:Minorities/females/veterans/individuals with disabilities/sexual orientation/gender identity
Territory Sales Manager
US-WI-Mayville
Job ID: 2024-3552
Type: Regular Full-Time
# of Openings: 5
Category: Sales
Scag Power Equipment
Overview
We are seeking a self-starter interested in a career in field sales. Specifically, someone with the intelligence, enthusiasm and work ethic to develop relationships with new/existing outdoor power equipment dealers and leverage the Scag brand to meet stated objectives. These objectives will include annual sales goals, product sales goals, new dealer recruitment, dealer development and the continuous upgrading of the Scag dealer network.
 
 

Territories are available in Texas, Oklahoma, Arkansas, Louisiana, Mississippi and New Mexico/Arizona.
Responsibilities

RESPONSIBILITIES – To CompanyUnderstand all selling and marketing programs and to develop a plan to meet annual goals and objectives.Communicate the uniqueness and value of Scag products to your dealers.Be an active part of our customers’ businesses – on site calls should represent the majority of a Territory Manager’s time. Help and direct the dealer to devote maximum effort and resources to our products. Know your competition (pricing, practices and products).Perform product demonstrations as needed.

RESPONSIBILITIES – To DealerWork with dealers to establish sales goals for all products and provide market vision.Proactively help the dealer manage, control and resolve dealer problems. (sales, operational, business finance)Train dealer and all sales personnel on the features & benefits of Scag products.Assure dealers are informed about their major competitors. (products & operations)Monitor dealer’s inventory and suggest action. (i.e. maintain proper inventory, place emphasis on slow moving merchandise.)Represent your dealers to the company and vice versa.Ensure dealers have signage, POP and an on-line presence around the Scag brand.
Qualifications
2+ years of external sales experience – preferably outdoor power equipment wholesale and or retail.High school degree is required.Great communication and follow through are necessary.Mid to high level of proficiency with Microsoft based programs and applications (Excel, Word – others). Physical ability to use and operate all forms of power equipment is required.Ability and willingness to work non-standard hours (to meet customer needs).Ability to travel the territory effectively – Most travel will be by pick-up truck.Must live in, or be willing to locate to, assigned Scag territory.Clean driving record.Driver's License (Required)Willingness to Travel - (70% on the Road / 30% Home Office)
